Have you recently made it to level 606 and not sure how the Frog works? Check out this tutorial! 

How the Frog works in Candy Crush Saga (Click on “read more” for full description if needed):

The Frog can be matched like a normal candy, it will eat the same color candies and grow. 
After it consumes enough candies the frog will start pulsing. 

You can click on it once, hover, and bring it to another part of the board you want to clear. It will then create a wave and take the candies around the selected area. 

After this, the frog will then return to normal size and change colour. 

Tips:

Combine the frog will special candies!
Use a color bomb on the same color candies to make it grow faster!"

How the Candy Frog works in Candy Crush: (Click on “See more” for full description) 

The Candy Frog can be matched like a normal candy, it will eat the same color candies and grow. 

After it consumes enough candies the frog will start pulsing. 

You can click on it once, hover and bring it to another part of the board you want to clear. It will create a wave and take the candies around the selected area. 

After this the Candy Frog goes back to small size and changes color. 

Tips:

Combine the frog will special candies
Use a colour bomb on the same color candies to make it grow faster

CANDY CRUSH MAKEUP CHALLENGE! 

Create a delicious Candy Crush inspired masterpiece and send your picture to Tiffi@king.com.

Make sure you include a visible note in the picture with “#CandyCrushMakeUpChallenge” so your entry is valid. (Only real notes, not photoshoped or edited)

We'll create an album with our 10 favorite entries and the Candy Crush fans will vote for the winner.

The winner selected by our sweet fans will receive a very special giftbox, including a Candy Crush makeup bag, a Candy Crush gym bag, $60 worth of Facebook Gamecards for use in the game, a Candy Crush clutch wallet, exclusive sunglasses, socks and stickers.

Two runner-ups will also receive a cool goodie box with stickers, sunglasses, a tote bag and socks!

End date to send entries is 31st July at 23:59 CET. Only original content will be valid. T&C's: http://to.king.com/YAnB
